title: Preparing a TOTALLY new KEEN game
content:
Hi to all.
When I was a kid I played all Commander Keen games and I enjoyed them a lot. Now I want to create a Commander Keen game, but a totally new game: new graphics, new music, new levels, new story...
I don't like game making programs because all games end being equal between them. For that reason I'll code the engine and the game. But I need some help with the graphics. I have a character drawed, but I'm very bad doing animations and backgrounds. Also, I have in mind some ideas:
You'll control Billy, but also Billy's dad [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]
They both have a transformation gun, so they can turn into other animals and use new powers.
Maybe the game won't be called Commander Keen, but both characters will use their PogoSticks and guns.
This isn't the typical project that ends dying. I'd like to do a commercial quality 2D platform game.

Anyone interested?
